Some datasets used for pretraining and evaluation are contributed from the awesome Turkish NLP community, as well as the decision for the model name: BERTurk. ## Stats The current version of the model is trained on a filtered and sentence segmented version of the Turkish OSCAR corpus, a recent Wikipedia dump, various OPUS corpora and a special corpus provided by Kemal Oflazer. The final training corpus has a size of 35GB and 44,04,976,662 tokens. Thanks to Google's TensorFlow Research Cloud (TFRC) we could train an uncased model on a TPU v3-8 for 2M steps. For this model we use a vocab size of 128k. ## Model weights Currently only PyTorch-Transformers compatible weights are available.
